product_name: Advanced Elements High Power Single Action Hand Pump
long_description: The Advanced Elements High Power Single Action Hand Pump is designed specifically for high-pressure inflatables. Aluminum alloy shaft and rigid handle increase comfort during use; built-in pressure gauge monitors inflation. Versatile design features both inflation and deflation capabilities. The Advanced Elements High Power Single Action Hand Pump fits many valve types, and includes 6 valve adapters.
short_description: The Advanced Elements High Power Single Action Hand Pump is designed specifically for high-pressure inflatables.
